information.description: YTMusicUltimate unlocks all if not most of the YT Music premium features. It also adds some extra usability features.

changelog.changes:
- Fixed Volume bar and Playback speed button.
- Added Traditional Chinese support.
- Fixed YTMusicUltimate icon for correct button display.

- Added option to disable radio (endless music) feature.
- Added option to hide History and Cast buttons in the navigation bar.
- Login fix for AltStore/Sideloadly etc. (a.k.a Can't sign in because Google can't confirm it's safe) - Thanks to @PoomSmart for IAmYouTube.

- Added option to skip non-music segments (SponsorBlock) - Based on @LillieH1000 's YouTubeReborn.
- Temporarily removed fix for AltStore/Sideloadly and etc. to prevent AltStore crash.

- Refreshed tweaks preferences.
- Added more options to enable/disable.
- Updated to YTMusic 5.55.1.

- Updated Japanese, Simplified and Traditional Chinese languages - Thanks to @SKEIDs and @mumuisdog.
- Small bug fixes.

- Added option to enable seek backward/forward buttons.
- Added option to remove sort filter button from the navigation bar.
- Small improvements.

- Fixed seek buttons glitch.
- UI improvements.

- Added option to unstick headers.
- Added option to remove tab bar labels.
- Added option to select startup tab.
- Fixed login issues on free developer and enterprise certificates (AltStore/Sideloadly/Scarlet etc.).
- Fixed rare tab bar icons glitch and code improvements.
- YTMusic app updated to v6.06.3.
Seek buttons option replaces Skip buttons instead of Like/Dislike

- Added YTMUltimate button under player to download Audio/Artwork image (Thanks to @BandarHL).
- Added option to hide Downloads tab (Tab options).
- Added options to manage downloading features (Player options).
- Added clear cache feature (YTMUltimate settings).
- Added audio, covers downloading feature.
- Added option to disable content warning (Player options section).
- Added option to force enable premium (Premium options section).
- Added option to set Downloads tab as startup page (Tab bar options section).
- Rewrited settings, most of options applies immediately.
- Fixed Default playback mode not working on some devices.
- Recommended reinstalling YTMusic IPA.
